title: Sofia4Cities with Docker
description: This document explain how to create docker images of all the modules of the platform and how to execute it with Docker Compose
detailedDescription:
The document main goal is to explain how to launch a deployment of the Platform in a local environment.

All the information can be found on this [**link**](https://github.com/sofia4cities/sofia4cities/tree/master/docs/how-to-execute-docker)

The process takes the following steps:

- Step 1: Install Docker and Docker Compose
- Step 2: Compile the sources with Maven to generate the artifacts (.jar)
- Step 3: Generate Docker images of the platform
- Step 4: Launch the execution of containers in the persistence layer
- Step 5: Loading tables and data in configdb and realtimedb
- Step 6: Launch the execution of the containers of the platform modules
